testcase.name: Booking in Report
testcase.system-out: Step 1: Logging in... Using login URL: https://erp.poundshop.com/login Username: Hitesh Login successful. Step 2: Navigating to Goods In > Booking In Report... Navigation successful. Step 3: Opening filter panel... Step 4: Selecting From Date (yesterday)... Selected yesterday's date: 25 Step 5: Searching for user Maria Stefania... User selected. Step 6: Applying filter... Step 7: Reopening filter panel and cancelling... Test completed.
